showToast.description: 'all', 'none', 'redefined', 'custom' - shows small toast message in the right top corner

isOnPause.description: if true, console object is redefined but no alerts are triggered

isDisabled.description: if true, console object left as is

isStringifyInput.description: if true, converts arguments to text

isShowAlertTitle.description: if false, sends arguments to alert() function as is

customMethods.description: adds additional custom methods to the console object

redefinedMethods.description: list of console object methods to redefine

customGlobalFunctions.description: if not empty, adds it as an alert() to the window object

preHook.description: if not empty, adds it as an alert() to the window object

afterHook.description: function to be run before the alert()
